title: Executive Order 10482-Providing for an Additional Member of the Government Contract Committee
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and statutes and as President of the United States, it is ordered that section 3 of Executive Order No. 10479 of August 13, 1953, entitled "Executive Order Establishing the Government Contract Committee" shall be, and it is hereby, amended (1) by striking from the preamble of the said section the word "fourteen" and inserting in lieu thereof the word "fifteen", and (2) by striking from paragraph (b) of the said section the word "Eight" and inserting in lieu thereof the word "Nine."
citation: Dwight D. Eisenhower, Executive Order 10482-Providing for an Additional Member of the Government Contract Committee Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/306997
